name: AutoCAD Batch Plot File
summary: A BP3 file is a batch plot list created by version 14 or earlier of Autodesk AutoCAD 2000, 2000i, 2002, or 2004. It contains a list of one or more files a user designates to publish to a plotter or printer via AutoCAD. BP3 files store information about each file and sheet in the list, including the name of each file or sheet, the type of file, the number of copies to be printed, and the save location of each file or sheet.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
